channel.title: What to burn DVDs on?
channel.description:
Ok well most of you will prolly think this is a pretty stupid question, but think what you want. I don't really know anything about this stuff at all, so lets begin.
I want to download some movies from a torrent site, I already know how to do all this.
So to burn it would I need a program? Like alcohol120% or something?
And what kind of disc would I need to burn it on? I looked at Wal-Mart and only became confused! I know it would be something with DVD in it, but there were DVD-R and DVD-RW(maybe something else too). So what does all that mean and what would I need for what I want to do?

item.title: What to burn DVDs on?
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

Firion:

I would recommend Nero 6.0. For movies, use a dvd since you won’t be needing the disk again.

Ok, and I might download something over it if I get tired of the movie.

Read full topic

item.title: What to burn DVDs on?
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

Ok thanks guys. And I have windows, so what you said won’t work for me will it?(I think I saw it say its for Linux anyways)

Read full topic

item.title: What to burn DVDs on?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

http://k3b.plainblack.com/ is the best, but on windows Alcohol 120% will do.

Read full topic

item.title: What to burn DVDs on?
item.dc:creator: @apzrman apzrman
item.description:
@apzrman wrote:

I use a few programs.

DVD Shrink - for copying copyright protected dvds
DivX Converter - for .DivX, .Xvid, .avi
Nero - can’t remember why i needed this, but it’s great
Iso Buster - for console games

Read full topic

item.title: What to burn DVDs on?
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

DVD R = Re usable
DVD RW = RwWritable
DVD = once

Read full topic

item.title: What to burn DVDs on?
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

Ah ok thanks Un-Named.

Read full topic

item.title: What to burn DVDs on?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“mjordan, post:5, topic:80040”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=117531.msg1158221#msg1158221 date=1176614452]
You need a DVD RW drive to write to discs.
[/quote]

Yep my computer has one of those. So would I need to install a burning program like alcohol120% or am I good to go? And Whats the difference between a DVD-R and DVD-RW disc?[/quote]

DVD-R can only be used once, whereas DVD-RW can be used many times. I suggest you take a look here.

Generally you should burn the iso/largest file there.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“mjordan, post:3, topic:80040”][quote author=Elite2142 (Skating On Java) link=topic=117531.msg1156857#msg1156857 date=1176602267]
Do you have CD or DVD rewriter?
[/quote]

nope, I cant just use my computer to do it?[/quote]

You need a DVD RW drive to write to discs.

Read full topic
